about_the_game:
Multi-functional live wallpaper tool to set diverse wallpapers on your desktop!

Interactive professional web wallpapers: unlimited creativity!

  • Support the latest web front-end technology framework, support local HTML networking
  • Freely use the third-party front-end development toolchain you are familiar with for web wallpaper production
  • Through the built-in API interface, the web wallpaper can interact with the local operating system:
    • Directly call in HTML to open local applications, system power on, adjust volume, etc.
    • Directly obtain operating system resource information, such as CPU, RAM usage, The current system volume, network traffic information, real-time audio spectrum, etc.
  • Through the above interfaces and HTML animations, animations, events, and deep integration, you can make functional web wallpapers, such as application storage bars integrated with wallpaper UI, system resource display, real-time audio spectrum, etc.

multi-screen and zoom support

  • support multi-screen, DPI Zoom
  • Set the same or different wallpapers for each screen individually

Share & download

  • Share your wallpapers with built-in tools
  • Browse and download your favorite wallpapers with built-in tools
detailed_description:
Multi-functional live wallpaper tool to set diverse wallpapers on your desktop!

Interactive professional web wallpapers: unlimited creativity!

  • Support the latest web front-end technology framework, support local HTML networking
  • Freely use the third-party front-end development toolchain you are familiar with for web wallpaper production
  • Through the built-in API interface, the web wallpaper can interact with the local operating system:
    • Directly call in HTML to open local applications, system power on, adjust volume, etc.
    • Directly obtain operating system resource information, such as CPU, RAM usage, The current system volume, network traffic information, real-time audio spectrum, etc.
  • Through the above interfaces and HTML animations, animations, events, and deep integration, you can make functional web wallpapers, such as application storage bars integrated with wallpaper UI, system resource display, real-time audio spectrum, etc.

multi-screen and zoom support

  • support multi-screen, DPI Zoom
  • Set the same or different wallpapers for each screen individually

Share & download

  • Share your wallpapers with built-in tools
  • Browse and download your favorite wallpapers with built-in tools
legal_notice: All copyrights and other intellectual property rights of "Wallpaper Web", as well as all information content related to the APP, including but not limited to: text expressions and their combinations, icons, decorations, charts, colors, interface design, layout frames, relevant data, or electronic documents, etc. are owned by "Wallpaper Web" and are protected by copyright laws, international copyright treaties and other intellectual property laws and regulations.
name: Wallpaper Web

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (with Aero), 8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: 1.66 GHz Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 4000 or above
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: .NET Framework 4.7 or later
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, AMD HD7870, 2 GB VRAM or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: .NET Framework 4.7 or later

short_description: Versatile live wallpaper tool! Professional web interactive wallpaper support!
